description: Describes method and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor.
title: transferOption

$eref.description: Object for collecting information about a duration or period of time.

___transferFrequency.description: The rate of occurrence of distribution.

___unitsOfDistribution.description: The tiles, layers, geographic areas, etc., in which data are available.

___distributionFormat.description: Provides information about the format used by the distributor.

$eref.description: Provides information about the format used.
$eref.title: format

___amendmentNumber.description: Amendment number of the format version.

___technicalPrerequisite.description: Description of any technical capabilities that the consumer must have to use the data set in the form(s) provided by the distributor.

___compressionMethod.description: Recommendations of algorithms or processes that can be applied to read or expand resources to which compression techniques have been applied.

___formatSpecification.description: Citation of the specification for the format.

___offlineOption.description: Information about obtaining the resource through off-line procedure.

$eref.description: Information about offline media on which the resource can be stored or distributed.
$eref.title: medium

___units.description: Units of measure for the recording density.

FGDC CSDGM: distinfo > stdorder > digform > digtopt > offoptn > offmedia

___mediumSpecification.description: Name of the formaton which the resource may be stored

FGDC CSDGM: distinfo > stdorder > digform > digtopt > offoptn > recfmt

___mediumFormat.description: Method used by the resource provider to write to the medium, such as: tar, iso9660, etc.

___numberOfVolumes.description: The number of items identified in the media resource.

___density.description: Density at which the data are recorded.

FGDC CSDGM: distinfo > stdorder > digform > digtopt > offoptn > compat

___note.description: Description of other limitations or requirements for using the medium.

___transferSize.description: Estimated size of a unit in the specified transfer format, expressed in megabytes.

___onlineOption.description: Information about obtaining the resource on-line.

$eref.description: Information about accessing online resources and services.

___description.description: Detailed text description of what the online resource is/does.

___function.description: Function performed by the online resource.

___applicationProfile.description: Name of an application profile that can be used with the online resource.

___protocol.description: The connection protocol to be used such as: ftp, http, etc.

___protocolRequest.description: Request used to access the resource depending on the protocol, e.g. body of POST(http)_ request.
